name: quadstore
description: Quadstore is a LevelDB-backed RDF graph database / triplestore for JavaScript runtimes (browsers, Node.js, Deno, Bun, ...) that implements the RDF/JS interfaces and supports SPARQL queries and querying across named graphs.

scripts.watch:cjs: rm -rf dist/cjs && mkdir -p dist/cjs && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > dist/cjs/package.json && tsc --watch -p tsconfig.cjs.json
scripts.test:build: cd test && tsc && node ../fix-esm-import-paths.cjs . && cd browser && webpack -c webpack.config.cjs
scripts.test: npm run test:build && npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.build:esm: tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && echo '{"type": "module"}' > dist/esm/package.json && npm run build:esm-fix-import-paths
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.publish:alpha: npm run build && npm publish --tag alpha
scripts.publish:beta: npm run build && npm publish --tag beta

author: Jacopo Scazzosi <jacopo@scazzosi.com>
